vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
καθεξῆς,
adverb, = the more usually ἐφεξῆς, [NT+1st c.AD+]; poetry κατά θ᾽ ἑξείης [Refs 3rd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
in order, in a sequence
in a continual order, or series, successively, consecutively, Lk. 1:3; Acts 11:4; 18:23; ὁ, ἡ, καθεξῆς, succeeding, subsequent, Lk. 8:1; Acts 3:24*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: en orden o secuencia (de lugar en lugar HCH.18:23) ; después de esto (LUC.8:1)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 一個跟著一個,依次地, 照次序地
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 一个跟着一个,依次地, 照次序地
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: lần lượt; liên tiếp; theo thứ tự
